AboutPage.title: About the Dreisatz Rechner
AboutPage.description: Background of the Dreisatz Rechner project
AboutPage.introduction: Dreisatz Rechner combines classic mathematics with modern web technology. We build learning material, step-by-step explanations and a reliable calculator for school, training and professional use.

HomePage.title: Dreisatz Rechner – Master proportion and inverse proportion
HomePage.description: The Dreisatz Rechner solves proportional and inverse proportion tasks with detailed, German-language explanations for school and business use.

hero.title: Dreisatz Rechner explains every step
hero.description: Paste entire word problems, let the Dreisatz Rechner determine the relation and receive a clear answer sentence.

stats.title: Why learners trust the Dreisatz Rechner

features.title: Dreisatz Rechner features
features.description: Everything you need to master proportion tasks.

items.title: Natural language parsing
items.description: Enter German text, the Dreisatz Rechner recognises numbers and units automatically.

items.title: Two calculation modes
items.description: AI text mode or the classic A1/B1/A2 inputs for full control.

items.title: Step-by-step explanations
items.description: Analysis, formula and answer sentence ensure transparent maths.

items.title: Export and share
items.description: Copy the calculation steps or create worksheets in seconds.

AIPolaroidPage.title: Dreisatz Rechner
AIPolaroidPage.description: Curated template packs inspired by the community's favorite storytelling moments.

hero.title: Template packs that speak your language
hero.description: From celeb meetups to retro travel logs, each pack blends prompts, overlays, and typography for instant results.

sections.title: What you get
body: Prompt recipes tuned for Gemini Nano Banana, Midjourney, and custom LoRA styles.
Matching border frames, captions, stickers, and handwriting fonts for cohesive storytelling.

sections.title: Popular collections
body: Celeb Selfie Studio — designed for fans who want a believable autograph moment.
Reunion Therapy — warm, low-contrast presets ideal for hugging your younger self or long-distance family.
Runway Archives — high-fashion poses, chromatic aberration, and magazine-style typography.

AIPolaroidGeneratorPage.title: Dreisatz Rechner Generator
AIPolaroidGeneratorPage.description: A deep dive into the generator workspace and controls.

hero.title: Generate cinematic polaroids without guesswork
hero.description: Experience live previews, guided prompts, and Gemini-powered rendering tuned for instant film aesthetics.

sections.title: Workspace highlights
body: Side-by-side variations render in seconds so you can compare lighting and mood instantly.
Adjust color grade, border width, caption overlays, and grain strength without leaving the canvas.

sections.title: Advanced controls
body: Prompt composer merges your keywords with camera metadata and film stocks like Kodak Portra or Fuji Instax.
Batch mode lets you produce up to 20 consistent shots for albums, campaigns, or merch drops.

sections.title: Output formats
body: Square 1:1 for feed posts, vertical 9:16 for Stories and Reels, and 3×4 inch 300 DPI for physical prints.
Export layered files with transparent borders when you need custom layouts in Figma or Canva.

AIVintagePhotoPage.title: AI Vintage Photo Effects
AIVintagePhotoPage.description: Recreate classic film moods with modern AI tooling.

hero.title: Turn digital shots into timeless vintage keepsakes
hero.description: Mix Nano Banana's precision with handcrafted LUTs, dust overlays, and light leaks for believable film outputs.

sections.title: Film science, simplified
body: Color science profiles emulate Kodak, Polaroid, Ilford, and expired film palettes.
Adaptive grain scales to your export size so textures stay sharp when printed.

sections.title: Use cases
body: Content creators producing nostalgia content for Xiaohongshu and TikTok.
Wedding and event teams offering same-day polaroid wall experiences.
Brand activations that need on-location instant prints without analog gear.

Page.title: Dreisatz Rechner
Page.description: Explore curated examples generated by creators and brand partners.

hero.title: See what's possible with AI polaroids
hero.description: Discover trending looks, community spotlights, and campaign-ready layouts updated every week.

sections.title: Featured showcases
body: Creator spotlights highlighting top-performing Xiaohongshu posts.
Brand collaborations featuring event activations and pop-up print bars.

sections.title: How to get featured
body: Tag #dreisatzrechner on social or submit via the in-app gallery uploader.
Share behind-the-scenes prompts and lighting notes to help others recreate the look.

TutorialsPage.title: Dreisatz Rechner Tutorials
TutorialsPage.description: Step-by-step guides for crafting the perfect AI polaroid story.

hero.title: Master the AI polaroid workflow
hero.description: Follow quick tutorials to capture, generate, refine, and publish your instant photo narratives.

sections.title: Starter lessons
body: Picking the right source photo and framing for AI rendering.
Using mood boards and references to guide template selection.

sections.title: Advanced techniques
body: Editing prompts for different lighting scenarios like neon nights or daylight flash.
Combining LoRA styles with overlays to build a signature brand aesthetic.

PolicyUgcPage.title: UGC & Copyright Policy
PolicyUgcPage.description: Creators may upload only media they have rights to use. We review takedown requests within 24 hours and provide safe remix tools.
body: Dreisatz Rechner Photo lets you combine your own photos with AI-generated effects. Only upload images, prompts, and overlays you have permission to use.
We do not host unlicensed celebrity likenesses or commercial IP. For takedown requests, email support@dreisatzrechner.org with relevant URLs and proof of ownership. We respond within 24 hours.

solver.title: Solve Dreisatz Rechner word problems in natural German
solver.description: Paste the entire assignment — we identify the ratio, compute the missing value, and explain every step. Dreisatz Rechner erklärt jeden Schritt.
solver.textareaPlaceholder: Example: Ein Auto verbraucht 8 Liter auf 100 km. Wie viele Liter braucht es für 350 km?
solver.helper: Tip: include numbers and units such as km, €, minutes and double-check the Dreisatz Rechner for unit consistency.
solver.errorTooShort: Please describe the problem with at least 12 characters.
solver.errorGeneric: We could not solve this problem. Please try a simpler wording.

result.title: Solution
result.shareError: Sharing is not supported on this device.

feedback.question: Was this explanation helpful?
feedback.placeholder: Optional: describe what the AI should improve.
feedback.submitted: Feedback saved. We will use it to improve future answers.

apiErrors.parse: We could not understand the quantities in this task.
apiErrors.missingNumbers: Please provide at least two known values and one target quantity.
apiErrors.unknown: Something went wrong while solving the task.

checklist.description: Control questions for Dreisatz Rechner tasks

contact.description: Get in touch with the Dreisatz Rechner team

terms.title: Terms
terms.description: Usage rules for the Dreisatz Rechner

hero.title: Dreisatz Rechner — Understand ratios effortlessly
hero.description: The Dreisatz Rechner explains each step in German, from text input to answer sentence. Use the AI mode for word problems or the classic mode with A1, B1 and A2.

sections.title: What is the Dreisatz Rechner?
sections.body: The Dreisatz Rechner is a German-language tool for proportional and inverse proportional problems. It analyses complete assignments, identifies the relation, and generates a clear explanation.

sections.title: Who benefits from the Dreisatz Rechner?
sections.body: Students, apprentices, teachers and professionals rely on the Dreisatz Rechner for homework, exam preparation and day-to-day calculations.

sections.title: Why use the Dreisatz Rechner?
sections.body: Automatic text parsing, detailed calculation steps and error-prevention checklists make it a reliable companion for maths and business tasks.

HeroSeo.title: Dreisatz Rechner online – solve ratio problems with ease
bullets: Analyse full text problems with Dreisatz Rechner
Free tool for school, training and business
